Title: Allows certain judges, justices, and criminal prosecutors to carry a concealed firearm in court, where no magnetometer or security personnel is present
Summary: Allows certain judges, justices, and criminal prosecutors who are duly licensed to possess a concealed firearm, to carry such concealed firearm in court, where no magnetometer or security personnel is present.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to allowing certain judges, justices, and criminal prosecutors to carry a concealed firearm in court, where no magnetometer or security personnel is present
